headline: PERKIN-ELMER/SCIEX ORGANIC SAMPLE INTRODUCTION KIT
description: Organic Sample Introduction Kit    For use in set-up procedure when  using volatile organics in an Elan 6000  Series ICP Mass Spectrometer.  Perkin-Elmer P/N N8122117 ($9600 list)
categories.lvl1: Laboratory Equipment > Other Scientific and Laboratory Equipment
specstable:
Manufacturer Perkin Elmer
Model Elan 6000 series
Description Organic Sample Introduction Kit
Accessories Set up procedure requires a refrigerated bath/circulator
Other Information Kits are new/never-used and contain the following:
  • Operation Manual
  • Carrying case
  • Drain tube assembly/DRC adapters
  • Torch quick-connect tube
  • Meinhard Nubulizer
  • Glass spray chamber w/ cap
  • Glass spray chamber adapter
  • Spray chamber support bracket
  • Consumables kit
  • 1 gal. waste bottle
  • All necessary tubing
Power Requirements 60 Hz
Condition New-Never Used
Exterior Dimensions
Width 23.000 in (58.4 cm)
Depth 17.000 in (43.2 cm)
Height 9.000 in (22.9 cm)
Weight 15 lb (7 kg)
